title: Famous Mosques Quiz
description: Explore the world's most stunning mosques and test your knowledge of Islamic architecture and history.

questions.question: The Great Mosque of Mecca (Masjid al-Haram), the largest mosque in the world, surrounds which sacred structure?

The Süleymaniye Mosque in Istanbul was designed by which famous Ottoman architect?
The Mosque of Muhammad Ali, built in the Ottoman style with a large central dome, sits atop the Citadel in which city?
The Faisal Mosque in Islamabad, Pakistan, is distinctive because it lacks traditional what?

The Prophet's Mosque (Al-Masjid an-Nabawi) in Medina contains the tomb of which important figure?
